response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $8,000 by both myself and you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at an exclusive price of $7,200. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your interest and commitment. I believe this price reflects the value you would place on the product while allowing you to enjoy significant savings. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 7200}
